bill.title: Charitable organizations; violations of the Charitable Bingo Law are also a violation of law requiring registration.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 79-11-505, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That Charitable Organizations That Conduct Bingo Under The Charitable Bingo Law Shall Not Be Exempt From The Requirement That Charitable Organizations Must Register With The Secretary Of State; To Amend Section 79-11-509, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize The Secretary Of State To Deny, Suspend Or Revoke The Registration Of A Charitable Organization For Violations Of The Charitable Bingo Law; To Amend Section 79-11-519, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That It Shall Be A Violation Of The Law That Requires Charitable Organizations To Register With The Secretary Of State For A Registered Charitable Organization To Violate The Provisions Of The Charitable Bingo Law; And For Related Purposes.
